同一词翻译一致/同一词翻译一致_0053.jpg.mt:
Haier dual circulation thermostatic technology recreates a new high in the industry!
Thermostat ceiling, full comfortable bath
Solve the industry's difficult problems of sudden heat and cold when turning off the water in the bath and then turning it on again
Achieve a truly comfortable bath with constant temperature throughout the entire process

Thermostat 1.0
Bypass mixing water
Neutralize the hot water in the pipeline
However, it only solves the problem of secondary water output exceeding the temperature
Unable to solve the problem of cold water at startup and shutdown
Temperature control is not accurate

Thermostat 2.0
No cold feeling thermostat
Two-level adjustment start-stop valve
Hot and cold mixing only solves the problem of hot water
No preheating, cold water still exists
The temperature drop exceeds 10°C during autumn and winter seasons
Raw water cannot be eradicated

Thermostat 3.0
Dual circulation thermostatic
Start-stop constant temperature + heat storage constant temperature
Hot and cold neutralization cycle eliminates scalding water
Pre-heat storage cycle eliminates cold water
Solve the trouble of raw water in the bath
Regardless of the severe cold and heat in all seasons
Ensure constant temperature throughout the entire bath
src: 海尔双循环恒温科技 再创行业新高！
恒温天花板 全程舒适浴
解决沐浴中途关水再开水温忽烫忽冷的行业难题
实现真正的沐浴全程恒温舒适
但仅解决二次出水超温
无法解决启停冷水问题
恒温2.0 - 无冷感恒温 两档调节启停阀
冷热混合仅仅解决烫水
无前置预热 冷水依旧存在
恒温3.0 - 双循环恒温 启停恒温+储热恒温
冷热中和循环 消除烫水
前置储热循环 消除冷水
解决沐浴夹生水的烦恼
